data.title: 以 3 到 5 分钟描写以下主题
data.content: Would you rather travel by yourself or with a group? Explain the reasons for your preference.
data.answer: Travelling has now been one of the most popular ways of entertainment throughout the world due to the advancement in technology. If I were to travel abroad, I would like to travel with a group. This is because when you share the interesting things you encounter during the course of traveling with others, that feeling of happiness can be magnified. Apart from that, traveling with a group can also help ensure that you are safe and sound. That is to say; whenever you are in trouble or encounter some kind of problem, there are people to help you out.（99 字）
